title: Okra curry
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '1/2 onion, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon fenugreek seeds', '1 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon tumeric', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '3 to 4 curry leaves', '400g okra', '3 new potatoes, cut into chunks', '2 carrots, cut into chunks', '475ml water', '1/2 green chilli, sliced']
